DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and tolerability of Continuous Positive Pressure for SAOS in Down Syndrome patients.
DOC.brief_title: Down Syndrome and Continuous Positive Pressure Therapy
DOC.criteria: Down Syndrome patients with an Obstructive Sleep Apnea Syndrome more than 18 years old predictable noncompliance of device noncompensated cardiopathy nonstable thyroxin treatment nonstable diabetes
